verse_no:
गुरुर्ब्रह्मा गुरुर्विष्णुर्गुरुर्देवः सदाशिवः । 
न गुरोरधिकः कश्चित् त्रिषुलोकेषु विद्यते ॥

terms.सदाशिवः: Sadashiva (a form of Shiva, the god of destruction)
terms.This verse from the Brahma Sutras highli: disciple relationship and the need to seek guidance and knowledge from a qualified guru.

meaning: Meaning:The guru is Brahma, the guru is Vishnu, the guru is Deva (god), the guru is Sadashiva. There is no one greater than the guru in the three worlds.Explanation:
